Title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson: The Hound of the Baskervilles
Writer: Arthur Conan Doyle (novel), Igor Maslennikov, Yuri Veksler
Plot: When Sir Charles Baskerville is found dead in his country house, Dr James Mortimer asks Sherlock Holmes for help to save Sir Henry Baskerville, the only known heir, from the curse that haunts Baskerville family.
